message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for sale. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $120 is too low for me. This product is high-quality and worth more. How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $160?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
